reviews.text: Staff seem to be friendly enough to help out. Toilets are situated after buying a ticket but are free which in most stations is rare. Four platforms but lots of space along there for people to sit out of the cold. There's mostly snack and coffee stalls on every platform. Really nice station but could do with a bit of a lick of paint, a refresh and some modernisation.

Decent station.  Needs to be renovated!  Coventey has become a University town..therefore, a new station is needed.  I'm shocked by how the toilets are of no access unless you have a ticket. The staff needs more training, they're absolutely RUDE! would love to see improvements.

Been quite shocked that member of staff are not able to help any of the passengers at all and has one answer for everyone :"I don't know!". Please train your staff for them to be able to do their basic job requirements.
It's a great main station going in 4 immediate directions

Staff rude and not helping at all, "impossible by design to speak to anyone directly on the phone at Coventry Station and the door to the customer services is always locked and if you knock on the door the staff hide round the corner or pretend to be working and cannot hear you. In short a total callous indifference to any pretense of customer support."-same... Not helping to get to the toilets, not able to find sane employers and as I see from previous reviews these problems have been told but no one really cares to change it. Good to know.
